title: Soul Oddity - Tone Capsule [1996] [Album]
description:
Soul Oddity - Tone Capsule

Label	Astralwerks
Year	1996

1.	Mezzo Modular	1:04
2.	Welcome Back to Earth	6:51
3.	Little Alien	6:37
4.	People Party	7:47
5.	Freq Shift	6:02
6.	Clipped	7:49
7.	Soul Communication	5:50
8.	DJ Tokyo	6:19
9.	Cruxx	7:02
10.	Fugue	8:28

This is psychedelic electro-funk the way it was meant to be . . . the product of alien abduction.

If you like Phoenecia, Simon Posford, Shpongle, Younger Brother, and their ilk, then you are in for a treat with this album.

Soul Oddity was years ahead of the world they released into. This music is unhinged from the mainstream, and grounds itself in pure and tasteful psychedelia.

DJ Elation's "Tough Break Kid" tape is the closest sounding thing to this I've ever heard. And that is one of my all-time most sought mixtapes. PM if by the grace of all that's holy you have a passable copy of THAT gem
